name: Number of teams where players playing in Atlético de Madrid have played
Birthplace, number of teams, club number and position of Real Madrid players ordered by club number
val:
PREFIX p: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
SELECT ?player ?clubnumber ?position COUNT(?clubs) ?birthPlace WHERE {
 ?player p:currentclub  <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Real_Madrid_C.F.> .
 ?player p:position ?position .
 ?player p:clubs ?clubs .
 ?player p:clubnumber ?clubnumber .
 ?player p:birthPlace ?birthPlace .
}
ORDER BY ASC(?clubnumber)

name: Teams of La Liga whose name is like 'Madrid'
val:
PREFIX p: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX o: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX r: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
SELECT * WHERE {
 ?teams o:league  <http://dbpedia.org/resource/La_Liga> .
 FILTER regex(str(?teams), 'Madrid','i') .
 
}
